text.section: In addition, Article 1 of this chapter contains general definitions and principles of construction and interpretation applicable throughout this article.

law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 132, sec. 57, effective July 12, 2012. -- Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 242, sec. 45, effective July 12, 2006. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 130, sec. 75, effective January 1, 1997. -- Created 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 77, sec. 4-104, effective July 1, 1960.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/12/2006). Under the authority of KRS 7.136(1), the Reviser of Statutes has added paragraph headings[(a), (b), etc.] before terms referenced in subsections (2) and (3) of this statute that are defined in other statutes. The words in the text were not changed.
